Html:
Tridef with fraps is a great way to turn your 2d content into 3d content for the rift for vrplayer.

Anyone know better ways?

Interesting, I did not try this yet.
Do you have any recommendation for article/tutorials?

An other idea: Maybe it would be possible to do the conversion live with a direct show filter..
Please contact me if you know a good implementation.

-Stephane
